title: 0/5 Provisional Games, And It's Not Even My Fault
body:
Im  in my provisional games right now and Im 0/5, every game I get placed in a team with at least one player who's feeding.
I'm not that great of a player so I can't really carry my team, I mostly play jungle. My playstyle results in me depending on how the lanes are doing (most of the time), so my KDA is worth crying for. Is there any way I can fix this so I don't get placed in Bronze 5 (cuz I don't think I'm that bad)?

UPDATE: I got placed in Silver 4 with 3/7 <3
